hero.description: Building scalable web applications with modern technologies. Currently lecturing at <1>Woldia University</1> and crafting digital solutions at <3>Degan Technologies</3>.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me
about.description: I am a passionate Software Engineer and Fullstack Developer based in Ethiopia. With a strong foundation in computer science and years of practical experience, I specialize in building robust web applications using modern technologies.
about.subHeading: Combining academic excellence with practical software development experience
about.bio1: I'm <1>Sewmehon Engda</1>, a dedicated software engineer and fullstack developer with a passion for creating impactful digital solutions. Currently serving as a <3>Lecturer at Woldia University</3>, I bridge the gap between academic theory and industry practice.
about.bio2: My expertise spans across modern web technologies including Laravel, Vue.js, and various frontend frameworks. I've successfully delivered projects ranging from medical college management systems to inventory bots and knowledge management platforms.
about.educationSchool: Wollo University Kombolcha Institute of Technology
about.educationAward: I received a Medal Award for outstanding performance
